1.0.name: wordpress/adlemons
1.0.description:
What is AdLemons

AdLemons is the first adversiting platform focused in blogs.
If you are a blogger, with AdLemons you can take control of ads on your blogs, and establish the price of your ad units monthly, so you will increase your incomes easily.

The AdLemons plugin will let you to add your zones directly on your Wordpress as widgets, so you can drag it on your sidebar easily.
